posts.post_content: This card runs rough shot over black decks, enchanted with its own shield of the oversoul makes it 7/7 indestructible and flying with protection from 3 colors. The chances of it getting removed at that point are almost nill, and the game is in the bag. Equipped with a sword of kaldra might be pretty darn scary too. Pretty much a weaker, but much more playable version of progenitus, and one of the best spirit avatars.

Posted By: DarthParallax (2/2/2012 10:26:22 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
My only qualm with this card is it's vulnerability to white removal. Yes, it can't be Doom Bladed, burned, or bounced. And yes "dies to removal" is a sh!tty argument. But on a card whose whole purpose is to be virtually untouchable, it can be O-ringed way too easily. Then it's own Aura doesn't do much but stop combat damage from hurting it, it doesn't stop exile.  
  
Again, I hate to be 'that guy' but the whole -pseudo shroud/unblockability- thing is suppose to be the selling point much like Demigod's is revival.  
  
I will say it wasn't bad for limited. Since there were so many hybrid cards, chances were good if an opponent played a ![White](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=W&type=symbol) or ![Green](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=G&type=symbol) spell, the other side of it was of the three colors this is protected from.
posts.html:
My only qualm with this card is it's vulnerability to white removal. Yes, it can't be Doom Bladed, burned, or bounced. And yes "dies to removal" is a sh!tty argument. But on a card whose whole purpose is to be virtually untouchable, it can be O-ringed way too easily. Then it's own Aura doesn't do much but stop combat damage from hurting it, it doesn't stop exile.

Again, I hate to be 'that guy' but the whole -pseudo shroud/unblockability- thing is suppose to be the selling point much like Demigod's is revival.

I will say it wasn't bad for limited. Since there were so many hybrid cards, chances were good if an opponent played a or spell, the other side of it was of the three colors this is protected from.
